review: My  appointment was on 3rd June at  10.30 am and accordingly the treatment of implant surgery started . Dr. Smitha Nagraj was monitoring the process with other doctors . I  was very happy with Dr. Smitha very meticulously done the implant surgery without any pain  and a temporary bridging was done .  I thank all the doctors who attended on my treatment.
Dr. Smitha was very friendly and attentive with higher degree of patience to explain the process and issues and action plans. Highly recommend this place.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dentures, Crowns and Bridges,Dental Cleaning,Conservative Dentistry,Dental Surgery,Tooth Extraction,
review:
As a 54 year old Founder of an international project I have travelled the world and interacted with dentists on 3 continents. For 4 years I have been struggling with dental issues. Today Dentist Dr Smitha took an one hour to sit with me and work through various options involving possible removal of 5 molars with root canals, clearing out infections at areas where wisdom teeth were pulled, placing dentures and more.

Few things surprised me and I do not get surprised easily. First is the time she took. I have never interacted with a dentist that took 1 hour to sit with me. I felt valued and heard.

Second is her holistic approach. Dr Smitha clearly understands that the oral area, body and mind are intimately connected. Life style stresses have more impact than we know. I got great insight into life style stresses which have likely contributed to my dental problems.

Third is her commitment to the least invasive, simplest, cost effective solution possible. This truly amazes me in a time where many people are strongly influenced by monetary motivations.

I highly recommend Dr Smitha from Lalitha Dental Speciality Centre. After more than 5 decades I have found a dentist to return to. Have no doubt and experience the service for yourself.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,

    We strongly recommend Lalita Dental clinic for treatment of their dental issues to our relatives and friends
